description: Gurkinn`s Alakazam was first encountered on Mega Island where is was disguised with the Mega Evolution Guru. It battled against Ash`s Lucario in a test to see if it was worthy to obtain the Lucarionite and to be able to Mega Evolve. Gurkinn`s Alakazam can Mega Evolve.
name: Foodin (Concombre)
